Title: The Unbound Slugcat
Description:
"I was never supposed to be here."

[url=https://discord.gg/H5ZXffpe]My modding server[/url]. Please consider joining if you enjoy what I make.



A custom slugcat originally uploaded for 1.9.06 and released for it, updated.

He can chain walljumps, double jump by pressing the jump key, and has a semi-variable long jump.
When using Jolly Co-op, the colour of their boost is silver; when on singleplayer, it will be your custom colour.
Their boost does not stun, but does make sound.
No ending (yet) and minor changes to Pebbles and Moon dialogue that will be altered in the future.

I am not taking criticism; I made this for fun. Thank you.



Github: https://github.com/neoncityrain/NCRUnbound
Credit to Ice Fox of Camelot / Pix for the music in the files and to Agriocnemis / Ymir for helping code and keeping me from spontaneously combusting over math
Special thanks also goes to Scuglat, who encouraged me to revisit this mod.
